<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pinpoint Poisoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=1599) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 10)

</column>

---

Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons. When you successfully Strike a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature with a poisoned weapon or expose a flat-footed creature to an inhaled poison, the flat-footed condition also gives that creature a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.
name: Pinpoint Poisoner
